Text:
since you are comparing, use `==` instead of `=`,
like, change

    if ($disable_link = 1)

to

    if ($disable_link == 1)

OR you can do:

    if ($disable_link == 1) {
      echo '<script type="text/javascript">disable();</script>';
    }
    else {
      echo '<script type="text/javascript">enable();</script>';
    }
If you mean to open the link in new window, use `target="_blank"` instead of `rel="external"`

since you are comparing, use `==` instead of `=`, like, change if ($disable_link = 1) to if ($disable_link == 1) OR you can do: if ($disable_link == 1) { echo ''; } else { echo ''; } If you mean to open the link in new window, use `target="_blank"` instead of `rel="external"`, like: change Perfumes<\\/a> to Perfumes
